fields.label: Content-hold
fields.name: content
fields.instructions: Sections are the main containers for page content. They can be separated by "Dividers" to provide marketing content.

sub_fields.label: Menu Item Title
sub_fields.name: menu_item_title
sub_fields.instructions: The text to appear in the submenu linking to this section. An example is "Process" or "Formats".

sub_fields.label: Fixed Image
sub_fields.name: fixed_image_tf
sub_fields.instructions: Should a background image display as you scroll?

sub_fields.label: Image (1200x800)
sub_fields.name: fixed_image
sub_fields.instructions: This image will be revealed behind the section as you scroll.

sub_fields.label: Section Title
sub_fields.name: section_title
sub_fields.instructions: The title for the section. Does not have to be the same as the "Menu Item Title", but should be limited to 4 words.

sub_fields.label: Lead
sub_fields.name: lead
sub_fields.instructions: A sentence or two introducing the section.

sub_fields.label: Blocks
sub_fields.name: blocks
sub_fields.instructions: Blocks provide a structure for your content.

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.instructions: Add text content here. It will display in a column at the center of the page. Take care to use the headings appropriately, and use minimal formatting.

sub_fields.label: Feature List (icons)
sub_fields.name: icon_items
sub_fields.instructions: Add items to the list.

sub_fields.label: Icon
sub_fields.name: item_icon
sub_fields.instructions: Select from the following icons:

sub_fields.label: Description
sub_fields.name: item_desc
sub_fields.instructions: A brief description of the list item. Limited to 200 characters.

sub_fields.label: Descriptive List Items
sub_fields.name: descriptive_list_items
sub_fields.instructions: These are more fleshed out list items than the icons. They will display in a row with the image on the left.

sub_fields.label: Description
sub_fields.name: description
sub_fields.instructions: A 2-3 sentence description of the item.

sub_fields.label: Connected Artifacts
sub_fields.name: connected_artifacts
sub_fields.instructions: Show a list of connected Formats, Equipment, etc.

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.instructions: Text should supporting the image next to it. It's kind of like an expanded caption, and can be no more than 350 characters.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Upload an image. It's dimensions should be approximately 800x600.

sub_fields.label: Text Location
sub_fields.name: text_location
sub_fields.instructions: Should the text display on the left or right?

sub_fields.label: Icon
sub_fields.name: icon
sub_fields.instructions: Select an icon to display next to the Page's summary.

sub_fields.label: Connect a Page
sub_fields.name: page
sub_fields.instructions: Select a page to link to.

sub_fields.label: Testimonial
sub_fields.name: testimonial
sub_fields.instructions: Select the testimonial to display.

sub_fields.label: Display
sub_fields.name: display
sub_fields.instructions: Select the display of the divider.

sub_fields.label: Divider Type
sub_fields.name: divider_type
sub_fields.instructions: Select the type of divider to display.

sub_fields.label: Related Content
sub_fields.name: related_content
sub_fields.instructions: If you'd like to highlight a certain page, connect it here. The title of the page, it's excerpt, and associated icon will display.

sub_fields.label: Testimonial
sub_fields.name: testimonial
sub_fields.instructions: Select the testimonial to display.

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: cta_text
sub_fields.instructions: Something like "Use our estimator tool to get a detailed cost estimate of your transfer."

sub_fields.label: Button Text
sub_fields.name: cta_btn_text
sub_fields.instructions: No more than three words.

sub_fields.label: Link to Page
sub_fields.name: cta_link_to_page
sub_fields.instructions: Select a page for the button to link to.

sub_fields.label: Raw Link
sub_fields.name: cta_raw_link
sub_fields.instructions: Leave this blank if you are selecting a page above. You can also link to another section of this page, by adding a # in front of the "Menu Item Title" e.g. #Formats or #Quick_Quote.

sub_fields.label: Menu Item Title
sub_fields.name: menu_item_title
sub_fields.instructions: The text to appear in the submenu linking to this section. An example is "Process" or "Formats".

sub_fields.label: Fixed Image
sub_fields.name: fixed_image_tf
sub_fields.instructions: Should a background image display as you scroll?

sub_fields.label: Image (1200x800)
sub_fields.name: fixed_image
sub_fields.instructions: This image will be revealed behind the section as you scroll.

sub_fields.label: Section Title
sub_fields.name: section_title
sub_fields.instructions: The title for the section. Does not have to be the same as the "Menu Item Title", but should be limited to 4 words.

sub_fields.label: Lead
sub_fields.name: lead
sub_fields.instructions: A sentence or two introducing the section.

sub_fields.label: Blocks
sub_fields.name: blocks
sub_fields.instructions: Blocks provide a structure for your content.

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.instructions: Add text content here. It will display in a column at the center of the page. Take care to use the headings appropriately, and use minimal formatting.

sub_fields.label: Feature List (icons)
sub_fields.name: icon_items
sub_fields.instructions: Add items to the list.

sub_fields.label: Icon
sub_fields.name: item_icon
sub_fields.instructions: Select from the following icons:

sub_fields.label: Description
sub_fields.name: item_desc
sub_fields.instructions: A brief description of the list item. Limited to 200 characters.

sub_fields.label: Descriptive List Items
sub_fields.name: descriptive_list_items
sub_fields.instructions: These are more fleshed out list items than the icons. They will display in a row with the image on the left.

sub_fields.label: Description
sub_fields.name: description
sub_fields.instructions: A 2-3 sentence description of the item.

sub_fields.label: Connected Artifacts
sub_fields.name: connected_artifacts
sub_fields.instructions: Show a list of connected Formats, Equipment, etc.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: For a caption format, dimensions should be approximately 800x600 and 600x800 for the paragraph format, depending on how long the text is.

sub_fields.label: Text Format
sub_fields.name: text_format
sub_fields.instructions: Select the format of the text and image.

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: caption_text
sub_fields.instructions: Add a caption describing the image.

sub_fields.label: Paragraph Text
sub_fields.name: paragraph_text
sub_fields.instructions: Text to appear to the right of the image.

sub_fields.label: Connect a Page
sub_fields.name: page
sub_fields.instructions: Select a page to link to.

sub_fields.label: Page Description
sub_fields.name: page_description
sub_fields.instructions: 1-3 sentences describing the relevance of the connected page.

sub_fields.label: Testimonial
sub_fields.name: testimonial
sub_fields.instructions: Select the testimonial to display.

sub_fields.label: Content - hold
sub_fields.name: content_copy
sub_fields.instructions: Sections are the main containers for page content. They can be separated by "Dividers" to provide marketing content.

sub_fields.label: Display
sub_fields.name: display
sub_fields.instructions: Select the display of the divider.

sub_fields.label: Divider Type
sub_fields.name: divider_type
sub_fields.instructions: Select the type of divider to display.

sub_fields.name: cta_text
sub_fields.instructions: Something like "Use our estimator tool to get a detailed cost estimate of your transfer."

sub_fields.name: cta_btn_text
sub_fields.instructions: No more than three words.

sub_fields.label: Link to Page
sub_fields.name: cta_link_to_page
sub_fields.instructions: Select a page for the button to link to.

sub_fields.label: Raw Link
sub_fields.name: cta_raw_link
